Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler

Interface AppendDataHandler

  • public interface AppendDataHandler
    Handler for receiving APPEND message data.

    This handler receives the message literal for an APPEND command. Data is delivered in chunks as it arrives from the client.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    AppendState.acceptLiteral(int, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler.AppendDataHandler)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void appendComplete​(Mailbox mailbox, AppendCompleteState state)
      Called when all message data has been received.
      void appendData​(Mailbox mailbox, java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
      Called when message data is received.

    • Method Detail

      • appendData

        void appendData​(Mailbox mailbox,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
        Called when message data is received.

        This may be called multiple times as data arrives. The handler should accumulate or stream the data to storage.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the target mailbox for the message
        data - the received data chunk

      • appendComplete

        void appendComplete​(Mailbox mailbox,
                    AppendCompleteState state)
        Called when all message data has been received.

        The handler should finalize the message in the mailbox.

        Parameters:
        mailbox - the target mailbox for the message
        state - operations for completing the APPEND
